entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
